model_answer:
The answer is A: A confirmation dialog asking to change the default settings for the Normal.dot template, with the Yes button highlighted.
To save your APA formatting choices as the default for future documents, you need to go to File > Options > Save, then select the 'Save As' tab and choose 'Normal.dotm' from the list of templates. In the next dialog box, select 'Save as type:' and choose 'Word Template'. Finally, check the box next to 'Save this file as default format for new documents' and click 'OK'. A confirmation dialog will appear asking if you want to change the default settings for the Normal.dot template, with the Yes button highlighted.
The text visible in the first-page header at that moment is option A: Running head: ALL CAPS.
